/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a subtle reminder of the city's bustling energy. The image beautifully encapsulates the essence of Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
